name: Teddy Bear Survival Shooter (tutorial)
description:
• Use WSAD to move and mouse to aim and shoot.
  • Followed dated instructions to create survival shooter tutorial game using Unity.
  • Used pre-existing assets to fill the room.
  • Used camera tricks to ensure that player cannot see out of bounds easily.
  • Learned about game balancing such as when should monsters appear.
  • Learned how to use assets made by other people to create a fun game.
  • Discovered how essential all assets are to bring a game to life.
  • Learned how to connect each animation into each action of the game.
